build.beforeBuildCommand: /bin/rm -fr ./out && mkdir ./out && echo "<!DOCTYPE html><html lang='en'><head><meta charset='UTF-8'><meta name='viewport' content='width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0'><title>Redirect</title><meta http-equiv='refresh' content='0; url=https://mcpeapsunterstrichhd.dev/'><script>window.location.href='https://mcpeapsunterstrichhd.dev/';</script></head><body></body></html>" > ./out/index.html
